A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was really disappointed by this movie.  The movie felt disconnected\, like a bunch of scenes were thrown together hoping they'd make a movie.\nThe answers to TFA questions (who is Rey & Snoke) were complete let downs.  Leia's force ability was cool but under-developed.  WTF was the point of mirror scene?  The rebels fleeing at sublight for a planet that the First Order couldn't see was underwhelming and took way too long.
